title: Carolina, or, A description of the present state of that country and the natural excellencies thereof viz. the healthfulness of the air, pleasantness of the place, advantage and usefulness of those rich commodities there plentifully abounding, which much encrease and flourish by the industry of the planters that daily enlarge that colony / published by T.A., Gent ...
author: Amy, Thomas.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed for W.C., and to be sold by Mrs. Grover ...,
